extendedInfo.description: Never forget anything at the store again! This is the ad-supported version of our popular Shopping List app.v.1.7.2 adds the following features:- Send your list to anyone via email - Backup / restore your lists- Icons added to the context menus.- Added the UK Locale

reviews.title: Very handy
reviews.comment: Extremely convenient.  Never forget your shopping list because you always carry your phone.  And very nice not having to re enter items you buy frequently
reviews.author: Lynn West

reviews.comment: I like the check/uncheck feature, but unchecking is a hastle. It jumps back to the top and you have to scroll down each time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app... my only wish is that an account could be created. When my phone gets updated I have to recreate my list.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love being able to list items via isle number! Any chance of changing the currency?? N1.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app, user friendly and as simple or detailed as you want to make it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Easy to use. Keeps multiple lists even in different colors. Able to cross off items after purchasing it from the store shelves.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does The Job
reviews.comment: The only thing I can find wrong with this app is the add button gets hidden by the keyboard and could do with being near the top of the screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple little app that does just what it\'s supposed to do. Works great with Droid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I can do without the ads for singles in my area. I want one thats also HASSLE FREE
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent app, however the widget shows a blank list when I unlock my phone and I have to delete the widget and readd it. Launcher Pro and epic 4g.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy and customizable
reviews.comment: I use this every day for all my to-do lists. Can\'t be without it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love. You can choose your own colors for multiple list.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Since I always have my phone with me it really helps to have a list of what I need. Helps with the impulsive shopping. Love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would like to see a feature that automatically re-enters the aisle for items that have previously been entered (that you choose from a dropdown list.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Very nice, I use it every day...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this app. Would have given it a 5 if I can edit more on each list. Maybe if I purchase full version that will solve that prob.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s so satisfying to cross out items on my shopping list and have them automatically move to the bottom. Color options are awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: So easy to set up and use. I don\'t carry around paper lists anymore. Strictly a cell phone list thanx to this program.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Exactly what a busy mum needs! Places list as widget on front screen, i\'ll try this out for week before purchase full, well done!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app ! You can make a lists for anything..its your choice. I use this app far more than I ever thought I would !
reviews.author: A Google User
